title: CoinPump.info
author: CoinPump.info
content: Hi all, I have been developing some tools that I'd like to share:First is the social media volume scanner, which is different from other tools out there because it uses "lagging correlation analysis".https://members.coinpump.info/all-in-one-prediction/Every prediction made by the system is tracked for profitability over 1, 3 and 7 days:https://members.coinpump.info/daily-statistics/This is a pump scanner for Binance:https://members.coinpump.info/binance-cryptocurrency-pump-scanner/There are other tools on the site. Currently the site is free to use. If you have any questions feel free to ask!
